algoritm.title: the Algorithm of the game ‚öôÔ∏è
algoritm.link2: Description of the Central limit theorem
algoritm.desc: the algorithm the game uses a Board Galton (Central limit theorem)

honest.title: Honesty check üö®
honest.desc: Before the start of a new game, the system automatically generates a string. The string contains X baskets where the ball will fall. Next, the system generates a random unique set of characters (salt). The final step is to convert the resulting string using the SHA-512 hash function. The hash is received by the user before the game starts, and after the game you can compare the results. The procedure guarantees 100% honesty of the game, because the X of the basket for the next game is received in advance and it cannot be changed

list.0: Copy the hash before the start of the game (before pressing the "Release the ball")
list.1: Get the result of the game (X baskets)
list.3: Copy the NUMBER and SALT fields
list.5: Get the SHA-512 hash from the received string (using any resource)
list.6: Compare the results (copied hash before the start of the game and after)
desc: 1.8 is the number of the game, i.e. X of the basket (where the ball fell)
qT8EqG2NmiWF is the salt (known after the end of the game)
: is the separator between the number and the salt

description: Before starting the game, check the integrity check in the game (shield button)
Select the amount, risk and pin
The higher the risk, the higher the basket coefficients (X)
The pin affects the size of the playing field ("pyramids") and the coefficients in the baskets. Each pin has its own coefficients.
The "Release the ball" button starts the game
You can immediately launch 10 (or more) balls by quickly pressing the "Release the ball" button
The ball, getting to the basket disappears from the playing field ("pyramid")
The amount of the bet multiplied by the coefficient X the basket (which dropped the ball)
The amount is credited to your balance
For quick games, use the section "Auto-game"
Select the amount, risk, PIN and specify the number of games in the auto-game
Click on the "Autoplay" button
The system will automatically, without your participation, start launching balls
The site administration gives gift games to users in honor of holidays (or other events)
Gift games are free, but have activation limits (in other words, the games are not endless)
Like the usual gift games, they have identical logic and integrity checks.
The sooner you manage to see a publication about gift games, the greater the chance to activate the gift game
Gift games are published in the official Telegram channel and the official VKontakte group

dragonDungeonGame.cannotPickedUp: Cannot be picked up at the bonus level

dragonDungeonGame.bonusGame: The bonus game has opened for you

description: The player goes to the dungeon, where his task is to pass level after level and leave in time before the dragon grabs him. At each level, the player opens a chest, which increases his rate.

On your heroic path, the owner of the dungeon will meet, a meeting with whom will be fatal for you. You will be able to choose the number of dragons before starting your adventure. The multiplier of the rate depends on the number of dragons.
Passing the levels of the dungeon, you with some probability will be able to get stars. When you collect 3 stars, a portal to the dragon's treasury will open for you.
After you have collected 3 stars, you can enter the treasury. Here you can multiply your wealth. Open the chests and collect the jackpot!

ticketsGame.buyWash: Buy and erase cells with mouse or finger to get coins
ticketsGame.yourTicketsDesc: Erase the slots with the mouse or your finger to get your ticket numbers

description: We have launched a lottery, buy tickets of various rarities, where you can win up to 100,000 coins! Erase the compartments and claim the prize.
There are 3 types of ticket rarity and its jackpot, from smallest to largest. Also on the tickets it is indicated to what amount the jackpot is in them.
Matching the winnings on the ticket works along certain lines. The final win is determined after finding the line. A line is a coincidence of the same numbers.
Matching the winnings on the ticket works along certain lines. The final win is determined after finding the line. A line is a coincidence of the same numbers.
Matching the winnings on the ticket works along certain lines. The final win is determined after finding the line. A line is a coincidence of the same numbers.

description: This is an extremely simple but very interesting mode. All participants make any bet with coins, and a common bank is formed. Each participant gets his chance of winning, depending on his bet. The larger the bet, the greater the chance to win, but even with a small chance there is an opportunity to win the entire pot!

doubleGame.yourBidAccepted: Your bid has been successfully accepted

description: A version of roulette with 54 numbers: 26 black, 17 yellow, 10 red and 1 green. Each round the system chooses a random number. The task is extremely simple: place a bet on the color that you think will fall out. If you win, you get your bet multiplied by X, which is indicated next to the color. If you have not guessed the color, the coins will burn out.

infoModal.header: Crash is an online game, and like all online games, it has network disadvantages
infoModal.descriptionLabel: The speed of manual withdrawal (the "Withdraw money " button), the display of the chart on the page, directly depends on the following factors:

list.0: The speed of your internet connection
list.2: The power of a smartphone or computer (used to process the data of the graph and display it)

infoModal.serviceDRGN: The DRGN service does not guarantee the timely execution of manual withdrawals after clicking (the "Withdraw money" button) and strongly recommends using the automatic withdrawal function (the "Automatic withdrawal" field).
infoModal.label: I fully read and agree
infoModal.autoOutput: The "Auto-output" function is used on the server side, which reduces the risk problems associated with timely withdrawal by 99.9%

description: This is a game mode in which you need to predict at what odds a crash will occur and the game will stop. The crash occurs at a random moment in the game, but the more you hold out in the game, the higher the coefficient, and the more coins you will win.

nvutiHashModal.description: Before each game, the system generates a line containing the winning number (from 0 to 999999) and a random set of symbols (salt). Then the server encrypts it with the SHA-512 algorithm and shows it to you, this is a hash. This guarantees 100% honesty, because the winning number is known in advance and you see it before the game, but in encrypted form. Changing the winning chill will change the hash.

list.0: Copy the hash before starting the game
list.1: After the game, click the "Check " button
list.2: Copy the fields Number, Salt. Make a string out of them like: number: salt
list.3: Check directly with us or plug into any independent SHA-512 generator
list.4: The hash will match the hash copied before the start of the game

0.question: What is this site?
0.answer: DragonMoney üêâ - financial games with the withdrawal of real funds. At the moment, the site contains 5 of the most popular and famous financial games, as well as a unique game from the DragonMoney team - DragonDungeon , well-known and loved by all MONOPOLY Live and many other original slots (Fat Santa, Sweet Bonanza, Sakura Fortune, and others) from well-known providers in the gaming industry DragonMoney is registered in the Curacao and conducts its business in accordance with all established legal regulations.

1.question: How to play here?
1.answer: It's simple! Register using VKontakte, top up your balance (or use the bonuses section) and choose any game ü§ü Be sure to join our official Telegram channel - {link} (a lot of free coins due to promotional codes)

2.question: How to Refill the balance?
2.answer: To Refill the balance, open the 'Wallet' section and select 'Refill'. Next, select the desired payment method and click 'Refill.' Available payment directions: Bank card, Bank card USD, YuMoney, QIWI , Payeer, Perfect Money, Bitcoin, and many other ways

3.question: How to withdraw funds?
3.answer: To withdraw funds, open the 'Wallet' section and select 'Withdraw'. Next, select the desired payment direction and specify the details for withdrawal. Available payment directions: Bank card, Bank card USD, YuMoney, QIWI , Payeer, Perfect Money, Bitcoin, and many other ways

4.question: What is Wagering / Wager?
4.answer:
A wager is a condition with a set total turnover of bets, after which you can withdraw money from the account.
A simple example:
By activating a promo code with a 5x coefficient and an amount of 1000 coins, you need to win back an amount of 5,000 coins (1000 * 5x). After successful fulfillment of the wagering condition (the amount of 5000 coins was wagered) you can withdraw money from the account (create a withdrawal in the 'Wallet').

Each game on our resource includes its own wagering coefficient, which affects the reduction of the total wagering amount.
Here is an example (!):
The wagering coefficient of the Plinko game is 0.3x.
When creating a bet for 1000 coins, only 300 coins (1000 * 0.3x) will go to reduce the total wagering amount.
Another example (!):
The wagering coefficient of the Double game is 0.5x.
When creating a bet for 100 coins, the amount of wagering will be 50 coins (100 * 0.5x)
(you can get acquainted with the coefficients for all games on this page ).
Briefly about the activation of wagering (!):
If you already have an active wagering, by activating another one, the wagering amounts are summed up.
Eg:
Activated promo code No. 1 for the amount of 1000 coins with a 2x coefficient, wagering: 2,000 coins.
We activated promo code No. 2 for the amount of 500 coins with a 2x coefficient, the wagering is now: 3,000 coins.

5.question: I have withdrawn money, but they did not come
5.answer: Rules for processing withdrawal requests - from 1 minute to 2 days . This is due to the peculiarities of the payment aggregator. If the funds did not arrive in the declared deadline - please contact our support service. You will definitely be helped!

6.question: Are there commissions on the site for replenishment and withdrawal?
6.answer: Each deposit / withdrawal method has its own conditions (and sometimes there are no commissions). You can familiarize yourself with the commissions for replenishment and withdrawal of funds in the corresponding paragraphs of the 'Wallet' section

7.question: What is a 'Referral system' ?
7.answer: A referral system is a specially designed system for attracting new players, which allows you to significantly increase your profit on the site without additional investments. To invite users - send your referral link to a potential referral to register, or ask him to enter your promo code if he is already registered.

8.question: What is a 'Promo code'?
8.answer: A promo code is a code that a user can enter to receive a cash bonus. You can enter a promo code in the 'Bonuses 'section. As a rule, promo codes are published by the site administration in the official Telegram channel - {link}

9.question: Can I register multiple accounts?
9.answer: No, this is strictly prohibited. If a user has multiple accounts, these accounts will be blocked.

10.question: How can I promote my referral link?
10.answer: When promoting a referral link, it is forbidden to use such methods as Buksy and SPAM on social networks. You can advertise the link using a video on YouTube, as well as post the results of your games on your social media pages. .

11.question: What is 'Free coins' ?
11.answer: You can get coins for completing simple tasks (for example, join the VKontakte group) for free. Check out the tasks in the 'Bonuses' section, and get pleasant bonuses every 5 minutes and 1 time per day. And there are also bonuses associated with events in the world, for example, May 9, the beginning of summer, New Year

ticketsPage.title: My tickets
text: Table with your last tickets (last 100 tickets)
This page is intended to verify the integrity of the contest
MIN / MAX - ID of your tickets (ID range)
These values are
unique
within the contest and are set immediately after the bid is created
For example, MIN: 1, MAX: 100 is a range from 1 to 100 (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, N, 100)
Tickets appear only in real time (the history of past tickets is not displayed) and are reset to zero on the page at the time of choosing the winner of the contest

rules.title: Dragon Money launches Cryptoweek 2024!
text: In Cryptoweek we will raffle thousands of gifts - Money, Lottery tickets, Plinko Free bets, and main prize is 1 MILLION rubles!
It's very easy to participate in Cryptoweek. The drawing of one of the prizes will start at a certain time. During this time, you will receive tickets for all bets placed in any games.

Also you have to make any crypto deposit (using Usdt trc20, BTC, LTC etc) every day. For example, to participate in all draws during 21 of May you have to make at least one crypto deposit during 21 of May.
The order of the prize draw
For each bet made on the site for more than 10 rubles in the section (Other games -> Slots), tickets are credited
For each 1 ruble bet, the user receives 1 ticket. When making bets over 99 rubles, users are awarded bonus tickets. Ranges and bonuses are listed below.
Range No. 1: 10-99 rubles. Bonus: 0%
Range No. 2: 100-999 rubles. Bonus: 5%
Range No. 3: 1000-9999 rubles. Bonus: 10%
Range No. 4: 10000-99999 rubles. Bonus: 20%
Range No. 5: 100,000+ rubles. Bonus: 25%
Example:
The user placed a bet on 10 rubles. - received 10 tickets (range No. 1)
The user placed a bet on 80 rubles. - received 80 tickets (range No. 1)
The user placed a bet on 100 rubles. - received 105 tickets (range No. 2)
The user placed a bet on 102 rubles. - received 107 tickets (range No. 2)
The user placed a bet on 1000 rubles. - received 1100 tickets (range No. 3)
The user placed a bet on 9999 rubles. - received 10998 tickets (range No. 3)
The user placed a bet on 100,000 rubles. - received 125,000 tickets (range No. 5)
The user placed a bet on 110,000 rubles and received 137,500 tickets (range No. 5)

There is a countdown timer on the contest page. When the timer reaches 0, a prize draw is held for all users who have tickets. After the draw, the timer is reset and a new stage of ticket accrual and drawing takes place.
Draws will take place:
- from May 20 to May 26
Don't miss your chance, participate in the mayhem, place bets and win!

chatRain.title: Money rain
howItWorksDesc: The Rain of money is a great opportunity to share the joy of winning with other players.
1. Enter the amount of rain. It will be debited to your balance. The minimum and maximum amounts are indicated under the input field.
2. Select the number of rain recipients. The amount of rain will be distributed evenly between them. The minimum and maximum number of players is indicated under the input field.
3. Click the "Make it rain" button. After that, the system will randomly select the specified number of players and they will receive a rain of money.
The results of the rain will be displayed in the players' chat in the form of a special message.
chatRain.message: The player made a money rain!
chatRain.adminMessage: The administrator made a rain of money!

selfExclusion.title: Self Exclusion
selfExclusion.desc: Need a break from DragonMoney? To start the automated self exclusion process, please click the button below to receive instructions.

goToRest.title: Block access
goToRest.desc:
You are going to block yourself from access for 24 hours. 
A message will be sent to your linked Telegram account to activate the blocking. 
Would you like to continue?

info.title: A link has been sent to you in Telegram
info.desc: Follow the link from the Telegram bot to activate the rest mode for 24 hours. After activation, after 24 hours you will be able to extend the lock for any period, or continue the game. Attention! During the rest period, Deposits, Withdrawals, the ability to chat, the ability to place bets, and the ability to change information in your profile will be unavailable to you.
